author: schroedingerscode3676
content:
Howdy folks. I was finally convinced to bite the bullet and create an acct on yet another chat app, since the Telegram bridge apparently only works on the "<#598292067260825641>" server. Who knew?

Anyway, I'm Steven, I work for PegaSys as a researcher for stateless on Besu (Eth1) and an engineer on Teku (Eth2).
